# backgroundColor

**Instance Property**

The background color of the view.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var backgroundColor: NSColor { get set }
```

## Discussion

SceneKit displays this color behind the contents of the rendered scene. If the scene contents fill the view or if the scene provides its own background using the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNScene/background] property, the view’s background color may not be visible.

This property’s value must be a color that can be represented using RGBA components.

## Configuring a View

- **preferredFramesPerSecond**: The animation frame rate that the view uses to render its scene.
- **rendersContinuously**: A Boolean value that determines whether the view always renders at its preferred frame rate or only when its visible content changes.
- **antialiasingMode**: The antialiasing mode used for rendering the view’s scene.
- **SCNAntialiasingMode**: Modes for antialiased rendering of the view’s scene, used by the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNView] property.
